info.name: marvelapi
info.summary: Marvel api client and possible cli
info.html_description:
.. code:: ipython3

from marvel.client import MarvelClient

.. code:: ipython3

client = MarvelClient("http://gateway.marvel.com", "<api_key>", "<api_secrel>")

.. code:: ipython3

resp = client.get_comic(16246)

.. code:: ipython3

resp.json()
